transcript:
Customer: Hello? Hello? Haan mam, namaste.
Executive: Hello? Yes. Haan Sakshi baat kar rahi hu mam IndiaMART se aapke account manager.
Customer: Okay, okay, theek hai. Aur maine kuch product update kiye hai meri
Customer: [unintelligible] kya aapko usme koi [unintelligible] karni hai to aap dekh sakte ho.
Customer: Aur koi
Customer: Aur mujhe
Executive: Haan, mam, ek cheez bataiye to thoda network issue ho raha hai. Haan, mam, bataiye.
Customer: Maine mere products add kiye hai mere ID par. Okay. To usme koi correction chahiye, koi details incomplete hai to aap check kar sakte hai.
Executive: Haan, mam, bilkul abhi check kar rahi hu mam.
Customer: Aur dusri cheez mujhe uske liye leads mil milegi.
Executive: Haan, haan.
Customer: Buyers lead, buyers lead.
Executive: Haan, mam, aapko iske liye leads milengi. Mam, bas abhi turant aapka check kar rahi hu aur aapke leads bhi dikha rahi hu mam aapko.
Customer: Aur leads mujhe in and around go wo main dekh rahi hu. Ki chahiye kyuki wo parcel send karne ke liye jyada charge na lage aisa.
Executive: Achcha, in and around matlab aapke local mein aapko leads chahiye hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapke local region mein aapko leads chahiye taki aapko packaging charge aur aapko logistic charge kam lage hai na?
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Okay. Mam, aapne product add kar diya hai wo dikh raha hai mujhe clay kullad style tea cup with saucer.
Executive: Aapke yaha network ka issue hai kyuki aapki aawaz
Executive: Aawaz
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, mam, aawaz aa rahi hai theek se?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, boliye. Thodi aawaz clear nahi hai.
Executive: Ek minute mam, main aapko call back kar rahi hu ek minute.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to check product updates on IndiaMART.

- Wants leads from local region.



Resolution:

- Executive is checking the product updates.

- Executive confirmed leads will be provided.

- Executive will call back due to network issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product update, leads, network issue
